DOC.detailed_description: A total 75 diabetic patient ( 39 men 36 woman ) , age 36 69 year , diabetes least 3 year , recruit study . Type 2 diabetes define fast plasma glucose 126 mg/dl ( two time repeat ) take oral glucose-lowering agents.Diabetic patient stratify sex randomly assign one three treatment group use block randomization procedure . Depending upon treatment group , subject receive two capsule per day , 1 breakfast 1 dinner , period 4 month . Each capsule contain one follow preparation hence determine correspond group : Group MV : Zinc sulfate Magnesium oxide ( provide 10 mg Zn 125 mg Mg ) vitamin C ( 100 mg ) vitamin E ( 100 mg ) ; Group MVB : mineral vitamin supplement plus vitamin B1 ( 5 mg ) , vitamin B2 ( 5 mg ) , vitamin B6 ( 5 mg ) , biotin ( 50 µg ) , vitamin B12 ( 5 µg ) folic acid ( 0.5 mg ) ; Group P : starch ( placebo ) . All study medication , include placebo , supply Pharmaceutical Sciences Research Center ( Tehran University Medical Sciences , Iran ) indistinguishable . They store 20-25 0C .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes 3 year Resting blood pressure > 160/100 mmHg Taking vitamin and/or mineral supplement , thyroid hormone , estrogen , progesterone , diuretic antihypertensive agent Having history myocardial infarction hepatic disease Pregnant
